front.title: Update to the IANA CoAP Content-Formats Registration Procedures

abstract.t: This document updates RFC7252 regarding the registration procedures for the "CoAP Content-Formats" registry, within the "CoRE Parameters" registry group. The affected registration procedures are specifically those regarding the IETF Review or IESG Approval portion of the registry as well as those regarding the First Come First Served (FCFS) portion of the registry.
